title: great font - need help identifying
content:
Would love to figure out the font used for the couple's names, or both if possible. Thanks for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723060313im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font-idea_5638.jpg)
author: sheffield

comments.content: [Carolyna Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723060313/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black) for the couple's names and may be [Mrs Eaves](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723060313/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/mrs-eaves-ot) for the text.

It is [Carolyna Pro Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723060313/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/?refby=bowfin) from Emily Lime foundry.

- Mike Yanega

Aaah! Edged out at the wire! Fast work Ryuk.

- Mike
